interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Hunger Games " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Collector " .

progression.synopsis: Using the confusion about Makoto and Ayane 's sudden closeness as a segue, Kirin pulls out a bottle from seemingly nowhere, suggesting they retread an idea from their first Christmas Party and play "Spin the Bottle". Molly and Karin are both against the idea but fail to put up any significant resistance as Rin rushes over to begin playing. From here, various girls take a spin at the bottle.
trivia: Every girl that did the spin got an introductory screen where the screen darkens, and their name and a brief description is shown, which is the same introduction used for major characters in the Yakuza -series.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.36.
